translation.ja: 〈トンネルを抜けたとは 今でも言えないが〉

translation.en: but I'm walking.
translation.ja: 〈歩き続ける〉

translation.en: And often I go to the Cemetery of Kings where Sérgio's body is buried
translation.ja: 〈セルジオが眠る王様墓地を よく訪れて〉

translation.en: and I talk to him.
translation.ja: 〈話しかけてる〉

translation.en: Now he's up in there in the sky
translation.ja: 〈彼は空高くで〉

translation.en: and certainly still trying to save some people up there.
translation.ja: 〈人助けに励んでる〉

translation.en: I know one day I'll meet him again.
translation.ja: 〈いつか再会する〉

translation.en: But I really can't forgive the people who did this to him.
translation.ja: 〈だが犯人を許せない〉

translation.en: [in English] I was really impressed with his stoicism.
translation.ja: 彼の禁欲主義に感心した

translation.en: Never asked about himself, he asked about others, you know.
translation.ja: 他人の心配ばかり

translation.en: Never asked for anything for himself in the way of pain medicine.
translation.ja: 鎮静剤も求めなかった

translation.en: He was always asking, "Take care of the others,"
translation.ja: “他の人の心配を”と

translation.en: and I thought somebody should know that. I didn't know who to contact, I didn't know where he was from.
translation.ja: 彼がどこの誰なのか 分からなかったが

translation.en: I just knew his boss was Kofi Annan.
translation.ja: 彼の上司を知ってた

translation.en: So that night on my broken and battered laptop computer,
translation.ja: その夜 壊れかけたＰＣで

translation.en: I wrote a letter to Kofi Annan.
translation.ja: アナンに手紙を書いた

translation.en: 19th August, 2003.
[sniffles] You know, I'm not gonna get through this.
translation.ja: 本当に残念です

translation.en: "Subject: Sérgio Vieira de Mello.
translation.ja: 件名：セルジオ･ ヴィエラ･デ･メロ

translation.en: As you are painfully aware, at approximately 1630 today local time,
translation.ja: お気づきの通り 現地時間16時30分

translation.en: a horrible disaster occurred [voice breaks] at the UN headquarters in Baghdad.
translation.ja: バグダッドの国連本部で 大惨事が発生

translation.en: I was the first US soldier to arrive on the scene, and the sight was catastrophic.
translation.ja: 私が米国兵士の中で 最初に到着しました

translation.en: Unfortunately, Mr. de Mello passed away.
translation.ja: デ･メロ氏は 亡くなりました

translation.en: While there is no good way to die, it says a lot about a man's character
translation.ja: 彼の人格を物語る最期でした

translation.en: when his last thoughts are for his family, his co-workers,
translation.ja: 最後に思ったのは家族や同僚

translation.en: and his country, or in this case, the UN.
translation.ja: 国やこの事件でしょう

translation.en: I'm truly sorry we could not have kept our promise to get him out alive.
translation.ja: 彼を生きて帰す約束ができず 大変残念に思います

translation.en: The UN is fortunate to have people of this caliber working for them.
translation.ja: 国連は優秀な人材を得て 幸運です

translation.en: I salute all of them and hope that your mission in Iraq will conclude successfully.
translation.ja: 皆さんに敬意を表し イラクでの成功を祈ります

translation.en: Mr. de Mello was a humanitarian of the first order.
translation.ja: デ･メロ氏は人道主義者です

translation.en: He will be hard to be replaced."
translation.ja: 唯一無二の人です

translation.en: [Kofi Annan] Today we share our shock and sorrow at the loss of people we loved.
translation.ja: 愛する人を失い我々は皆 悲しみを共にしています

translation.en: All of them leave a huge void.
translation.ja: 心に大きな穴が開いています

translation.en: Raid, Leen, Ihsan, Emaad, and Basim,
translation.ja: ライド リーン イーサン エマッド バシム

translation.en: Rahim, Ranillo, Rick, Reza,
translation.ja: ラヒム ラニロ リック リザ

translation.en: Jean-Sélim, Christopher, Martha,
translation.ja: ジョンセリム クリストファー マーサ

translation.en: Fiona, Nadia,
translation.ja: フィオナ ナディア

translation.en: finally, Sérgio, my dear friend.
translation.ja: 最後に私の親友 セルジオ

translation.en: Why did you never seem tired while even working 18-hour days?
translation.ja: １日18時間働いても なぜ疲れを見せなかった？

translation.en: Why did you never look crumpled even after an 18-hour flight?
translation.ja: 18時間のフライトの後でも なぜ服がしわくちゃでない？

translation.en: Why were you never sick?
translation.ja: なぜ病気にならない？

translation.en: Why were you never grumpy?
translation.ja: なぜ不機嫌にならない？

translation.en: And you were the only top official in the UN known to everyone
translation.ja: 君は国連の幹部の中で 唯一皆に知られてる

translation.en: by his first name.
translation.ja: 名字でなく名前でだ

translation.en: Even to those who didn't know you personally
translation.ja: 君をよく知らない人に とっても

translation.en: you were always just Sérgio.
translation.ja: 君はセルジオだった

translation.en: [Power] It is heartening that around the world,
translation.ja: 世界中の励みになってた

translation.en: whether in the United Nations missions
translation.ja: 国連の任務においても

translation.en: or in humanitarian organizations or in governments,
translation.ja: 人権団体にも政府にも

translation.en: you do have individuals who ask themselves what would Sérgio do.
translation.ja: セルジオならどうするかと 考える人がいる

translation.en: The one answer that they know he would give is,
translation.ja: 彼が与えてくれる答えは１つ

translation.en: "Get out of the capital and go out into the world and figure out what's happening.
translation.ja: “世界へ出ていき 今起こってることを考えろ”

translation.en: Figure out what's making people tick.
translation.ja: “人々を動かす原因を探れ”

translation.en: Respect the dignity of the human beings whose lives are at stake here.
translation.ja: “危険にさらされる人間の 威厳を尊重しろ”

translation.en: Don't treat them as a model if there is a mass.
translation.ja: “彼らを手本として扱うな”

translation.en: Engage the bad guys.
translation.ja: “悪者の関心を引け”

translation.en: Be a man of action, but also never stop being a man of reflection."
translation.ja: “考えるだけではなく 行動を起こせ”

translation.en: [Larriera] I wish I could have an elastic time.
translation.ja: 軽快な時を過ごしたかった

translation.en: To be able to go back to the past and stretch out some special moments to a maximum.
translation.ja: 過去に戻って特別な瞬間を できる限り引き延ばしたい

translation.en: Now we know where that, uh, those times are finished and, uh...
translation.ja: もうあの時は終わったと 分かってる

translation.en: and... they won't happen again.
translation.ja: それにもう二度と やってこない

translation.en: When I finally made it back to Brazil, I went to this spot.
translation.ja: やっとブラジルに戻り この場所へ向かった

translation.en: The spot where we will always arrive
translation.ja: いつも行ってた場所なの

translation.en: every time we would hit the ground in Brazil,
translation.ja: ブラジルに到着するたびに

translation.en: and go straight into the water at the sea.
translation.ja: すぐさま海に飛び込むの

translation.en: I really felt the strength of his spirit and the kindness of his spirit
translation.ja: 私の感じた彼の魂の 強さや優しさは

translation.en: were right there.
translation.ja: そこにあった

translation.en: That's where I feel that... that Sérgio is now.
translation.ja: セルジオは今もそこにいる

translation.en: And where I feel that, uh, he really, really rests forever.
translation.ja: 彼は永遠にそこで眠ると 思うわ

translation.en: [Sérgio] My message is very simple.
translation.ja: 単純な話だ

translation.en: Never forget that the real challenges
translation.ja: 決して忘れないでほしい

translation.en: and the real rewards of serving the United Nations
translation.ja: 国連の仕事で真のやりがいを 感じるのは

translation.en: are out there in the field, where people are suffering, where people need you.
translation.ja: 人々が苦しみ助けを求める 現場へ行った時だ

translation.en: So, good luck. Welcome to the organization,
translation.ja: 国連へようこそ

translation.en: and here we are to help you in any way we can. All the best.
translation.ja: できる限りあなた方の サポートをします

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: よかった
